name: The Rabbit
description:
Help the hardworking mole.
Strategically collapse matching boxes to catch the thief rabbit. Explore all cabbage, carrot, cactus gardens to keep vegetables from thief.


~FEATURES~
•10 unique islands
•Over 50 levels with unique challenging obstacles
•Collect meals to reach world top 10

~PLAYER REVIEWS~
“I hate this game cause can't pass Mexicano cactus”
